description.@en: Mine own sins shall be forgotten, for I carry a light which cannot be extinguished within.

data.notes:
Mage Trait

Professions of this Archetype make use of strange healing arts, plumb the depths of the supernatural and study Spells. They come from all walks of life and have sacrificed some part of their humanity to further their aims.

effect.@en: You never gain Conflict for actions you can justify to the Historian are religiously or spiritually motivated.
